activities: Cambridge Partners receives requests for information regarding healthcare products and programs. This personal information will be coming, in most cases, from subsidiaries, affiliates or other entities, or as the result of programs initiated by these entities. It is the responsibility of these entities to be compliant with Safe Harbor principles.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: We utilize an in-house verification method.
personaldata: The majority of the personal data we collect will be provided to us and we will programmatically process this data. Manually processed data would be the exception.
privacyprograms: Cambridge Partners utilizes a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles which is overseen by one of our Directors.
recoursemech: For disputes involving personal information received by Cambridge Partners from the EU/EEA, Cambridge Partners has agreed to TRUSTe dispute resolution. Please see our Privacy Principles for more information regarding this procedure.   http://www.cambridge-partners.com/technical.html
